msg.msgText:
This command enables the management of groups, including adding groups, listing groups, updating groups, and deleting groups. SYNTAX: imaserver group help imaserver group <Action> help imaserver group <Action> <ActionOptions> EXAMPLE: imaserver group help imaserver group add help imaserver group add "GroupID=msgGroup1" imaserver group delete help
Action Choose from one of the following: add delete edit list ActionOptions Options for the action.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
